Name: Eronoctosis: Put Yourself Together
About the game: A 2-Player Online Horror Co-Op game. 'What is this place...? Who are you? Who am I?' Explore the deepest recesses of your mind to put yourself back together. There is a meaning to this realm of madness, we must work together to escape. Content Warning Horrific, disturbing monsters. Pixelated genitalia. Ominous and oppressive atmosphere. Asymmetrical tools means each player has unique role. One lights the way, the other holds the power to banish the nightmares. Stay close, communicate, and cooperate to make it out alive. Grab a friend and delve into the darkness.. Seek salvation, piece them together.
